Package ch.pschatzmann.starschema.views

Class TableView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.starschema.views.TableView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicTable, ITableView, java.io.Serializable

    public class TableView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITableView, java.io.Serializable
    Data view which calculates each cell value for each cell in two dimensions (rows, colums)
    Author:
    philschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
